lyrics:
29 contributorsmy friends lyricsverse 1
my friends are so depressed
i feel the question of your loneliness
confide cause ill be on your side
you know i will you know i will

verse 2
exgirlfriend called me up
alone and desperate on the prison phone
they want to give her seven years
for being sad

chorus
i love all of you
hurt by the cold
so hard and lonely too
when you dont know yourself

verse 3
my friends are so distressed
and standing on the brink of emptiness
no words i know of to express
this emptiness

chorus
i love all of you
hurt by the cold
so hard and lonely too
when you dont know yourself
see red hot chili peppers liveget tickets as low as 75you might also likeguitar solo

bridge
imagine me
taught by tragedy
release is peace

verse 4
i heard a little girl
and what she said was something beautiful
to give your love no matter what
was what she said

chorus
i love all of you
hurt by the cold
so hard and lonely too
when you dont know yourself8embed
